main event: Multiple military observers reported seeing blue lighted objects in Okinawa, maneuvering rapidly and disappearing.
interesting points: The sightings occurred between September 7 to September 10, 1959, multiple witnesses consistently described similar blue lighted objects, the objects were observed at various altitudes ranging from 1500 to 4500 feet, each sighting involved distinct groups of military observers, and the reports emphasized clear weather during the observations.
sighted object: blue lighted items in the sky
